title: Test harness called mladmin abort on 7.0 Linux RH5 cluster in test point-in-time-recovery-test-1.xml, as following XQuery did not finished in 30 minutes, which usually get completed in the said time.
description:
Test harness called mladmin abort on 5.0 Linux RH5 cluster in test point-in-time-recovery-test-1.xml, as following XQuery did not finished in 30 minutes, which usually get completed in the said time.

Machine name : rh54-intel64-43-test-3
ML Version : 20130218
Test name : point-in-time-recovery-test-1.xml
